<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// find an already reserved range that is large enough</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">      It.erase();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TotalAllocation = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(TotalSize, ReservationUnits);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">    Mapper-&gt;reserve(TotalAllocation, std::move(CompleteAllocation));</Highlight></CodeLine>
